recipesJson.name: berries and yogurt
recipesJson.author: spicygal
recipesJson.description: This is fine to shake and vape - we'll see how it does later.  I used yogurt and vanilla creme for a base then added some fruits.  I really like cherry crush - it's not a strong cherry - more like a cherry punch- sweet and a bit candy-ish - although I haven't single-flavor tested it.  But I've used it a couple times and it adds a nice flavor imo.  Then lucky leprachaun and biscuit for some crunch - off the shake that doesn't come out yet.
